title: The Jesus Dog
description: Haunted by his own selfishness, Curt Mane is determined to end his life by driving his 1970 Dodge Challenger into a ravine. On the way to destruction, he sees a diner that hadn't existed before. Drawn inside by the sounds and smells of his past, Curt is confronted by an angel who offers him an go back in time and rescue a child, or drive away into Hell.Meanwhile, the town of Desperation, California, needs a miracle, but the Devil wants that miracle dead. God's Toby, a boy chosen for something special and Barnabus, a dog touched by the Holy Spirit. And Zeke, a fallen evangelist, hiding away in a mountain home once owned by a mentally disturbed celebrity. Criminals, cults, and terrorists- they all come together on one explosive night, pitting the hate of Satan against the love of God, culminating in an unforgettable finish.
author: Darrell Bowman
